thread.title: Not what I expected..
thread.title_full: Not what I expected.. - Review of Ramada New York/Eastside, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kabe136bp
title: Not what I expected..
text: Employees at that front desk were not social , the construction going on near by doesnt let you sleep, the ice machine was broken, the constant slamming of doors, make sure you bring your own toothbrush and tooth paste, tub to small for 2 took to take a shower ,, house keeping continues to knock on your door even if you say you are busy or sleeping , the rooms ac and heating system turns on and off every minute making a loud noise when it comes on, they did not welcome me in the hotel and when I registered out not even a thank you or come again, I hope your experience was better than mine,
